sentences.sContent: Remove the cores, and bake the apples for 40 minutes.
sentences.sCn: 去除果心，然后把苹果烤40分钟。

sentences.sContent: ...They are more likely than women to cry when their core identities--as providers and protectors...
...At the core of the book is the idea that"technology is neutral"...
...But the core of the sharing economy is people renting things from each other...
...Where they will keep the same four core subject teachers for two years...
...The probes have also made scientists think that under its surface Europa has a rocky core giving off volcanic heat...
...The probes have also made the scientists think that under its surface Europa has a rocky core giving off volcanic heat...

phrases.pCn: 核心竞争力；核心能力；关键才能
型芯材料，裂变物质；内层芯板，磁心材料
矿样；岩芯样本；土芯样本

words.tran: 心脏；英国管（等于English horn或tenor oboe）
核化；结晶偏析；[地质] 取岩心
去（果）核；提取岩芯（core的ing形式）

trans.tranOther: the hard central part of a fruit such as an apple
